title: Critical Action
description: Highlights important and time-sensitive actions users must take

frontMatter.title: Critical Action
frontMatter.description: Highlights important and time-sensitive actions users must take

related.name: Alert
related.description: For non-urgent notifications and system messages

related.name: Service List Item
related.description: Dashboard component that can contain critical actions

when_to_use.value: When you want to highlight a single task that will otherwise block the user from proceeding
Time-sensitive actions preventing access to VA benefits or services

when_to_consider_else.value: Non-urgent or non-required actions; use [Alert](/docs/components/alert/) instead

content_considerations.value: Example: "Verify your life insurance dependents by June 4, 2025"
Keep concise; single sentence without period
Be clear about what action is required and when

accessibility.value: The component always contains a clickable link spanning from text to right-aligned chevron
Follow best practices for [Link](/docs/components/link/) and [Link - Action](/docs/components/link/action) components
Critical Action is non-dismissible; it's removed only when the action is completed
Ensure link text clearly describes the required action

frontMatter.code_usage:
<va-critical-action
  text="Verify your life insurance dependents by June 4, 2025"
  link="/verify-dependents"
></va-critical-action>
